text: Ne mwiloba khulimwo nende ebitonye bitilanga, ne khubiamo nende emikunda chie mizabibu, nende emimela chindi, nende emitende chimelanga mulina lilala nende echindi chilamelanga mulina elala. chiosi chitsushililungwa amatsi kalia kalia. Ne khukhola ebiindi ebilayi okhushila ebindi khukhulia. Mukano khulimwo nende emeeko khubandu bekhonyelanga obwongo
